gui.wizard-staff.blaze_powder_magic.name: 火焰噴射器
gui.wizard-staff.blue_dye_magic.name: 天氣控制器
gui.wizard-staff.bookshelf_magic.descrip: 如果你缺少皮革，那麼這就是適合你的咒語！
gui.wizard-staff.bookshelf_magic.name: 書本生成器
gui.wizard-staff.bricks_magic.descriptio: 用魔法磚包圍自己，建立一個安全的空間。
gui.wizard-staff.bricks_magic.name: 便攜式牆面
gui.wizard-staff.bucket_magic.descriptio: 使用魔法複製 %s 的用法。
gui.wizard-staff.bucket_magic.name: 魔法 %s
gui.wizard-staff.builder_magic.descripti: 利用法杖的魔力，在一瞬間建造一個 「%s」 建築。
gui.wizard-staff.builder_magic.name: 建造 「%s」
gui.wizard-staff.carved_pumpkin_magic.de: Create a large slow moving shadow that damages and weakens everything it touches.
gui.wizard-staff.clock_magic.name: Time Dilation
gui.wizard-staff.deage_magic.description: Shoot a de-age ray at an entity, turning it into a child.
gui.wizard-staff.deage_magic.name: Deage Magic
gui.wizard-staff.deflect_projectile_magi: Use your staff as a protective layer around you, deflecting projectiles.
gui.wizard-staff.egg_magic.description: Shoot a purple ray of magic at entities, trapping them inside an egg.
gui.wizard-staff.egg_magic.name: Eggization
gui.wizard-staff.elytra_magic.descriptio: Rotate your staff quickly enough to lift from the ground.
gui.wizard-staff.elytra_magic.name: Magic Helicopter
gui.wizard-staff.ender_chest_magic.descr: Use your staff to give you remote access to your ender storage.
gui.wizard-staff.ender_chest_magic.name: 便攜型終界箱
gui.wizard-staff.feather_magic.descripti: Use magic to dampen the effects of gravity, slowing your fall.
gui.wizard-staff.feather_magic.name: 慢速下降
gui.wizard-staff.ghast_tear_magic.descri: Use magic to enhance your crying, immediately extinguishing flames from you.
gui.wizard-staff.ghast_tear_magic.name: 抗火
gui.wizard-staff.gold_nugget_magic.descr: Use magic compel nearby Piglins to give you their items.
gui.wizard-staff.gold_nugget_magic.name: Magic Bartering
gui.wizard-staff.grappling_hook_magic.de: Use the staff as a grappling hook.
gui.wizard-staff.inventory_magic.name: Portable Chest
gui.wizard-staff.jukebox_magic.descripti: Emit an irresistible tune from the staff, forcing nearby enemies to dance.
gui.wizard-staff.jukebox_magic.name: Magic Music
gui.wizard-staff.locate_spawn_magic.desc: Channel your inner powers to gain a sense of which direction your spawn point lies.
gui.wizard-staff.locate_spawn_magic.name: Magic Compass
gui.wizard-staff.lodestone_magic.descrip: Right click a %s block with the staff, setting your waypoint to that block. Then, activating the staff anywhere in the world will return you to the waypoint, consuming the block in the process.
gui.wizard-staff.lodestone_magic.name: Magical Translocator
gui.wizard-staff.map_magic.description: Transform the item in the staff into a treasure map.
gui.wizard-staff.map_magic.name: Treasure Map!
gui.wizard-staff.mushroom_cloud_magic.de: Create a magic poison cloud in from of you, damaging anyone that enters it, slowly turning them into mushrooms.
gui.wizard-staff.name_tag_magic.descript: Conjure a name tag with a random name.
gui.wizard-staff.name_tag_magic.name: Random Name Generator
gui.wizard-staff.nether_brick_magic.desc: Use your magic to sense the direction of the nearest Nether Fortress.
gui.wizard-staff.nether_brick_magic.name: Fortress Locator
gui.wizard-staff.netherrack_magic.descri: Like Frost Walker but for lava, simple as that.
gui.wizard-staff.netherrack_magic.name: 在熔岩上行走
gui.wizard-staff.no_magic.name: No Magic
gui.wizard-staff.obsidian_magic.descript: Open a portal to the nether. WARNING: One way only!
gui.wizard-staff.obsidian_magic.name: Portal to Hell
gui.wizard-staff.pillar_magic.descriptio: Stand still and use the staff to automatically propel yourself upwards, while creating a %s tower below you.
gui.wizard-staff.pillar_magic.name: %s Pillar
gui.wizard-staff.portable_crafting_magic: Channel your magic to access a full 3x3 crafting table.
gui.wizard-staff.potion_magic.name: Potion: %s %s
gui.wizard-staff.projectile_magic.descri: Conjure and fire a %s in front of you.
gui.wizard-staff.projectile_magic.name: Launch %s
gui.wizard-staff.push_block_magic.descri: Use your magic to push %s blocks.
gui.wizard-staff.push_block_magic.name: %s Mover
gui.wizard-staff.push_button_magic.descr: Activate buttons from a large distance.
gui.wizard-staff.push_button_magic.name: Long Range Button Pushing
gui.wizard-staff.remove_fluid_magic.desc: Use your magic to remove fluid of type '%s' around you.
gui.wizard-staff.remove_fluid_magic.name: Fluid Remover: '%s'
gui.wizard-staff.repair_armor_magic.desc: Use magic to repair the armor you are wearing.
gui.wizard-staff.repair_armor_magic.name: Repair Armor
gui.wizard-staff.revert_position_magic.d: Revert your position to where you were five seconds ago.
gui.wizard-staff.shulker_bullet_magic.de: Use magic to replicate a shulker bullet, targeting a nearby entity.
gui.wizard-staff.smelting_magic.descript: Magical item processing, replicating the functionality of the %s.
gui.wizard-staff.smelting_magic.name: Magical %s
gui.wizard-staff.soul_sand_magic.descrip: Summon skeletal hands from the ground in front of your, damaging and slowing entities they touch.
gui.wizard-staff.soul_sand_magic.name: Hands from Below
gui.wizard-staff.surface_magic.descripti: Click on two blocks in the world with the staff, and then use the staff to automatically build a surface between those two blocks. Only works for axis-aligned surfaces, so no diagonals! It will build the surface using blocks from your inventory, of the same type as the block you clicked first. Costs experience based on amount of blocks placed.
gui.wizard-staff.surface_magic.name: Magic Surface Builder
Shot a transformation ray that turns %s entities into %s entities.
gui.wizard-staff.transmutation_magic.des: Transmutate the item in the staff into the item %s.
gui.wizard-staff.wizard_staff_magic.name: Staff-ception
